title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Fat Bombs
directions: Place butter, coconut oil and peanut butter in a microwave-safe container - microwave on high for 35 seconds or until melted; whisk to combine.
Add cocoa powder and sweetener - whisk to combine.
Pour evenly into 24 molds - freeze for at least 30 minutes; store in the freezer in a Ziplock bag.
ingredients: 1 packet Stevia or sweetener of choice
